text: Stuff and Dough () is a 2001 Romanian drama film directed by Cristi Puiu. The film was screened for the Directors' Fortnight at the 2001 Cannes Film Festival. == Cast == * Alexandru Papadopol - Ovidiu * Dragoș Bucur - Vali * Ioana Flora - Bety * Luminița Gheorghiu - Mama * Răzvan Vasilescu - Marcel Ivanov * Doru Ana - Doncea * Constantin Drăgănescu - Tata == References == == External links == * Category:2001 drama films Category:Romanian films Category:Films directed by Cristi Puiu Category:Romanian drama films
title: Stuff and Dough
